name: The Final Boulder
overview: A collection of BoulderDash games, No One's Boulder, BoulderHead and Final Boulder Dash, created by No One and using the updated BoulderDash Construction Kit. Includes: BoulderDash 1 BoulderDash 3-11 BoulderHead 1-3 No One's Boulder1-18 Final Boulder Thanks to updated BD Compression, all this on a single disk!
